questions.question: In bending test on mild steel dial indicators are used to
Type of support used to fix the specimen in bending test on mild steel is
When simply supported beam is subjected to centre concentrated load W

answers.a: Occurs at centre with value of WL/6 and (WL^3)/58 * EI
answers.b: Both maximum bending moment and maximum deflection occurs at central cross section
answers.c: Both maximum bending moment and maximum deflection occurs at 1/3rd span point
answers.d: Occurs at 1/3rd span with value of WL/4 and (WL^3)/58*EI

questions.question: As compared to uniaxial tension or compression, the strain energy stored in bending is only
In simple bending theory, one of assumption is that material of beam is isotropic. Assumption means that

answers.a: Normal stress varies linearly in material
answers.b: Normal stress remain constant in all direction
answers.c: Elastic constants are same in all directions
answers.d: Elastic constants varies linearly in material

questions.question: Pick up correct assumption of theory of simple bending

answers.a: Resultant pull or thrust on transverse section of beam is zero
answers.b: Material of beam is homogenous and isotropic
answers.c: Transverse section of the beam remain plain before and after bending
